message: I've been following Clear's map for what feels like hours. Something's wrong.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Ren, this isn't taking us to Oval Tower, is it?"
I can see Oval Tower to our right, but we're heading left.
Skeptical as I am, I keep walking until I arrive at the location indicated on Clear's map.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Clear. I think you sent the wrong map."
A man in a gas mask is waving from a window of the building in front of me.

name: 蓮
message: "It seems he got the wrong tower."
Glaring at Clear, I raise my Coil and take a deep breath.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You idiot! Get your ass down here right now!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You got the wrong tower! Hurry up and get down here!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You can freak out later. Just get down here already!"
His masked shape finally disappears from the window.
A minute later, a dejected Clear trudges out of the entrance to Overr Tower.
Clear in tow, I wearily head back the way I came.
